metadata.title: CVE-2023-29402 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: The go command may generate unexpected code at build time when using cgo.This may result in unexpected behavior when running a go program which usescgo. This may occur when running an untrusted module which containsdirectories with newline characters in their names. Modules which areretrieved using the go command, i.e. via "go get", are not affected(modules retrieved using GOPATH-mode, i.e. GO111MODULE=off, may beaffected).

criterions.comment: golang-1.13 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.14 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.16 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.18 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.20 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
